# EHM-Lab code repositories by Type

## Analysis

```{r}
analysis <- readRDS("tables/analysis.RDS")

datatable(analysis,
              rownames = FALSE, 
              escape = FALSE,
              filter = "top",
              options = list(autoWidth = TRUE, pageLength=5))
```
